Table 2 displays the data collection contained in the mitigation section of the NDCs from the Mediterranean countries. In addition to the unconditional mitigation target, some countries present a conditional mitigation target that depends on receiving international aid. In this study, only unconditional targets will be considered. It is also important to underline that the majority of countries submitted mitigation commitments for all the GHG. For this reason, this study is carried out using cumulative GHG emissions (Meinshausen et al. 2009; Alcaraz et al. 2019). Table 2
